website_summaries.verdict: The MamaRoo is admittedly pricey, and it won't be for every baby or parent. But for a parent that could use an extra set of arms, or any kid who can only sleep while being held, this 4moms device could make all the difference
pros: The core idea of the 4moms MamaRoo is clever and solidly implemented
Being able to rock your baby to sleep hands-free can offer serious relief to new parents
cons: Most of the extra features are disappointingly low quality: the poor speakers, the plain mobile, and the completely useless ambient sounds

customer_reviews.title: Was very good for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Was very good for about 4 months. (As expected) Once he could sit-up he really didn't want to be in this. Even with it in the upright position. It was a life-safer for those first months and would recommend it to anyone. Was super easy to set-up and had no problems. It's not that heavy either, so we where able to bring it up and down the stairs as needed. Like all baby stuff, it's run it's course and you're stuck with baby gear. At least this one has pretty good resell value or a happy friend donation, like in our case. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: jjk

customer_reviews.title: Great for Babies with Reflux-After Feedings
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was in the NICU for 5 weeks and every time she would cry the nurses would put her in their mamaRoo. We thought, why not get this when we get her home? We never regretted it. She has a small reflux issue, and every time we are tired of holding her upright after feedings, we place her in the mamaRoo, and it works like a charm! She’s entertained, and hardly notices that there’s a difference. Sometimes she falls asleep there. I would recommend this to any mom who would like to catch a break from holding her baby, especially after feedings.
customer_reviews.author: YNH

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt one of the most important items you should get your newborn baby. One of the most important investments. At first I was skeptical about paying so much for an item that I wasn't gonna use much, but once I got it I completely changed my mind. It gave us peace of mind, baby naps there throughout the day, no need to rock sing or dance, nothing, this swinger doesn't it all. I'm so relive I got it, better late than never. I strongly recommend this as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: AL88

customer_reviews.title: I do know that my daughter was thrilled with it and hopefully any day now my granddaughter will be equally as happy.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter for her yet to be born baby so I can't say how the baby likes it but my daughter loves it. I think this "swing" even makes coffee! Not really, but this is not your mothers baby swing. This is the baby swing of the future. It imitates walking motion as well as other movements such as side to side, up and down, etc, it plays music, in fact you can sync it to your IPhone and play whatever music is on your phone. It does so many things that I don't even know. I do know that my daughter was thrilled with it and hopefully any day now my granddaughter will be equally as happy.
customer_reviews.author: kyle carlson

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay... great for a newborn who doesn't move.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received the baby swing I was very impressed by fast shipping and good packaging. Loved that there is an app to control the movements. But, then the overhead arm broke off with a little bit of pressure and I wasn't impressed by how it didn't move, it stayed straight. I don't like how there's only a lap belt and not a complete chest belt. Seems unsafe for my now 3 month old who is getting more mobile. I personally wouldn't buy it again or suggest it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Amsbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Turns off mid-nap
customer_reviews.text: We rationalized buying this pricey bouncy chair because we figured it would last awhile and would be able to lend it to other families. We began using it in December of 2016 when our first child arrived. As of this month, October 2018, it has started randomly turning off mid-use. Frustrating is an understatement when you’re trying to get a baby to nap for more than 30 min. Our second baby is only 14 lbs, so I can’t imagine his weight is the problem. It’s been handled gently and our first baby only used it up until 8 months. The sound quality is sharp and tinny.
customer_reviews.author: L Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: Best chair ever hands down! Great quality super high tech with every option to inc sounds music huge built in speakers an app for blue tooth control I mean what didn't they think of!
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The ball hanging mobile hangs way too low. It is practically touching baby. I think this could be a good bouncer- but it all depends on baby. My little doesn't love it. And doesn't sit well in it. Wanting to return this. It's expensive - if you know someone that has it- ask them to try it first with your baby. It's too expensive for your baby to not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this for our son before he was born, he's been using it since we brought him home from the hospital and he absolutely loves it. Calms him down in seconds when he's mad. He even falls asleep in it for brief periods of time! Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TekkFit

customer_reviews.title: There packaging is amazing it literally shows you how to repack with all ...

customer_reviews.title: ... brought this for my granddaughter and so far so great! she loves it and it does everything it ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my granddaughter and so far so great ! she loves it and it does everything it tells you it does, I like that the seat is not to heavy so its easy to move around and really does not take up a lot of space so she comfortable sits in the middle of the living room floor and watches tv.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - design is much better when you see it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - design is much better when you see it (compared to photos) Sound quality is ok but not top (some sounds are not easy guess unless you read it!) little mobile on top does not move automatically so it has limited use (you need to move it yourself quite often) the range of motion is limited so it does not replace old-fashioned swings
customer_reviews.author: Allodynie

customer_reviews.title: Great for infants
customer_reviews.text: The Momaroo is great for putting your infant down. Worked with 2 of 3 kids. The middle kid didn't like it. A bit on the larger side for floor space, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Will break real fast and Costumer service not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Google the words “4moms mamaroo stops working” and you’ll have your review. Lasted less than 5 months. If you have another child it will break real fast as the slightest touch the wrong way will destroy the engine/motor. There is a reason why the warranty is for a year only. Costumer service was of no help whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Shlez Managment

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever! We got this gift for a friend as a group shower gift and she raves it! Keeps the baby occupied for a long time! We loved the fact that you can control it from your phone too! This is one you will be proud to give or receive!

customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and design of the product, but my daughter didnt like it. Too much money for a slow baby swing, plus the mobile its way too fragile for a baby toy. I will say dont waste your money, get a regular swing and save.

It was super easy to put together and our son loves it. He'll sit in it for hours if we let him, and he loves sleeping in it. Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality swing.....just not for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this swing because there is a setting called car ride, and my baby loves the car. The Mamaroo works just fine, is very smooth and quiet, and had multiple settings for movement. For my baby, it's just too smooth and too quiet. My baby cried whenever I put her in this and the various movements didn't appeal to her at all. I'm giving this 4 stars because it's a quality product and I'm sure this would be perfect for some babies. It just wasn't quite the right fit for us. I ordered the Graco DuetSoothe and it's much better for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing swing, I would have given it 5 stars ...

I like the featured sounds on it but when plugging a device into it the sound is rather tinny. My biggest suggestion would be for a more interactive mobile.

customer_reviews.title: so a baby with less colic might like it better
customer_reviews.text: Device works as described by the manufacturer, but my baby is unimpressed. I'm giving it 4 stars, because the item is well engineered and works as it should, but if my baby were giving it a review, she would give it 1-2 stars. She is almost 3 months old, and she refuses to sleep in this, she just cries. I would say she has some colic, so a baby with less colic might like it better. The recline is adjustable, and I had her as vertical as possible, but she still didn't like it. I am hoping that she may enjoy it more when she is older... like 5-6 months old - we'll see.

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for an expecting nephew and wife. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Parks

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this swing 👍
customer_reviews.text: Baby and mom both love this swing, and the price was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Farr

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavy babies
customer_reviews.text: Mamaroo really save my body from holding a 10lbs baby boy that wants to be held all the time. It's the only bouncer that will calm him down. Recommend for fussy baby!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy :(
customer_reviews.text: I had so much hopes on this bouncer, I was imagining my infant baby being so cozy and comfy in it but reality is different. The seat itself doesn't seem to be comfortable, I have Baby Bjorn manual bouncer, where the seat is simple and much better. My baby is just not enjoying this bouncer. I found that Fisher Price bouncers worked much better in soothing my baby girl than this one. It has lots of tech features (music form the phone and remote control) but for me that didn't work, kid just is not a big fan of this one:( Have to say that materials used look and feel of a good quality. Price, not friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Daija Augusto

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby who like bounce motion!!! Only thing my picky baby likes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Loved the mama roo while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Loved the mama roo while it worked, but product won't turn on after only having it for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Goding

product_meta.title: 2015 mamaRoo infant seat - classic grey
product_meta.description: It moves like you do. The 4moms mamaRoo infant seat bounces up and down and sways from side to side, just like parents do when comforting their baby. Select from five unique motions, like car ride and tree swing, and five different speeds. Choose from four built-in sounds or connect it to any MP3 player. The seat reclines to multiple positions to allow baby to lie back and relax or sit up and play. The mamaRoo is now Bluetooth enabled so you can control the motion, sound, speed and volume from your compatible smart device.
feature_bullets: 5 unique motions that move like parents do when comforting their baby (car ride, kangaroo, tree swing, rock a bye, wave)
Bluetooth enabled - control motion and sound
Easy to remove, machine washable seat fabric
Overhead toy mobile with reversible toys
